goal.en: "The goal of the curriculum is to provide students from diverse backgrounds with disciplines in clinical oncology. The curriculum comprises interdisplinary cancer biology, clinical cancer diagnosis/therapy concepts, and clinical cancer research. Students can gain insights from curricula that help inspire their researches in new directions."
goal.ch: 本課程的目標是提供來自不同背景的學生學習與臨床相關的腫瘤學知識。課程包括癌症生物學，癌症的臨床診斷/治療概論，以及癌症臨床研究。期望學生可以從了解實際臨床醫學而對研究方向有所啟發。
